lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: I want to see these businesses succeed and I'm so lucky to get to be a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: I work and live in the beautiful Teton Valley and I work at a store that carries carved wood furniture and antiques.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to give! ;o)
lender.occupational_info: My job is totally amazing, as is the healthcare team I work with. I help sick kids get better everyday...what could be more rewarding?!? Well...KIVA membership comes pretty close!

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: Well my teacher told the class about Kiva in class today and it's a way for me to help and do alittle part to stop poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I care for mentally challenged adults and it's part time work but its gratifing. I am also a student and one day want to work for the UN or another organization.

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: It's a way that, with my small resources, I can help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I development business and manage customer relations for my company in the Midwestern and Southeastern United States.

lender.name: LeBe
lender.loan_because: It's my way of saying THANKS for all my blessings.

lender.name: laura
lender.loan_because: I have been helped in my life. I know how important it is. It is a circle.
lender.occupational_info: As a massage therapist my work involves helping people heal from injuries, chronic tension and stress.

lender.name: Sue & Hayley
lender.loan_because: I try to give a little to others who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families. We are so blessed in this Country and wish only the best for others. I try to teach my daughter about the joy you get from helping others
lender.occupational_info: I work for a building company 3 days a week in the Office doing general office duties. My daughter Hayley is in Year 11 school and hopes to be a Teacher in the future

lender.name: Ma. Fe
lender.loan_because: I really wanted to change my childrens future..I am applying for this loan to start a new business which i know this would change our way of living and not just contented with what i am now. I wanted start a new life.. A new life together with my children.
lender.occupational_info: I am working in a very hazardous area...I am dealing chemicals..

lender.name: Jeffry
lender.loan_because: I believe that microloans help the person who receives the loan and the person giving the loan. It brings them together, even if only through the microloan system, and makes the world smaller and friendlier.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer who helps people protect their jobs or homes. Some of my clients are from other countries and are new to the United States. Others are ill or poor or with little education. I am called a "civil rights lawyer."

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: i had experienced being in poverty myself. I just want someone to have the opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Jericho
lender.loan_because: I'm exceedingly lucky and I have to give that back somehow.
lender.occupational_info: My job involves fixing problems.

lender.name: Mary-Lou
lender.loan_because: My Mother always told me that god helps those who help themselves and by giving loans someone can indeed help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I sew costumes and take care of them once the plays are being performed

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have money to loan
lender.occupational_info:
I run a small business. We have 39 rooms that we rent to travelers and vacationers. Our most common guests are Americans from Colorado, Texas, New Mexico, California and Arizona.
We are in a very small town with very large mountains surrounding us and I love it!

lender.name: Nick Lewis in NZ
lender.loan_because: I love the entrepreneurial spirit in all of its forms.
lender.occupational_info: Eclectic, energetic, and driven

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I admire these hard-working people who need so little compared to what I have. It is just a small way I can help to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I help kids to become good citizens of our world. And teach math.

lender.name: JCA
lender.loan_because: It's a rare chance to share good fortune in such a direct way--and to help create opportunity for people in challenging situations to use their smarts and ambition to improve their circumstance and to add life and prosperity to their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I write and illustrate picture books for all ages-

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher, but right now I am not teaching- I am going to school! I am learning about how education can make the world a better place.

lender.name: Ugo
lender.loan_because: I WANT HELP RURAL WOMEN OVER COME POVERTY AND GIVE THEM SKILLS TO IMPROVE CHANCES OF SURVIVAL IN THE COMMUNITY.
lender.occupational_info: SOCIAL ENTREPRENEUR, EMPOWERMENT SPECIALIST, TECHNOCRAT AND ADMINISTRATOR

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: the amount of suffering in the world appals me. Giving a helping hand to others feels good!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the specialty of Transfusion Medicine, with focus on the quality and safety of the prescription and administration of blood products to patients in a major public teaching hospital.

lender.name: crystal
lender.loan_because: I have a good life, and I'd like to help others have the same.
lender.occupational_info: I make ceramic sculptural vessels.

lender.name: Ian & Isabelle
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: Suzy
lender.loan_because: Todas las teorías son legítimas y ninguna tiene importancia. Lo que importa es lo que se hace con ellas. -Jorge Luis Borges

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to be the best they can be

lender.name: Mazzy
lender.loan_because: Western countries hold so much of the worlds wealth to the point where it is unfair. I loan to Kiva as I am able to make a real difference in someones life, without making them dependent on aid.
lender.occupational_info: I am a strong advocate for social justice and believe people working together to support each other is where the real change comes.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I can!!

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because:
For as little as $25, I can make a Real Difference! To make a $25 loan all I have to do is skip one lunch with one friend - to me it's lunch, to someone else it can make all the difference.
I like the sustainability inherent in this loan program. I like the ease and security of using PayPal. I like the fact that the recipients get ALL of the money you loan, not a %. I like the fact that this is a loan, not a hand out.
I never donated to "Feed the Children" despite the pitiful pleading ads. The administrative cost for that program is very high, and I always felt that if I had to feed Sally Struthers first, there would be little if anything left over for the children.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a small architectural firm in downtown Cleveland, Ohio USA. I come from a 4th generation local family printing company and celebrate the 'mini-entrepreneur' spirit.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: To help those with ambition get ahead.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of providing opportunity to someone who statistically may not qualify for a bank loan but desires entrepreneurial freedom. I lend because everybody deserves the chance to nurture their own business model, and to personally enjoy the financial stability and personal dignity that stem from their achievements.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am a graduate student at The American University of Paris & L'Institut Catholique de Paris.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I want to help fulfill dreams and aspirations

lender.name: Loani
lender.loan_because: I have the benefits of a happy, safe and healthy life where I live. Ibelieve in the concept of "paying it forward" and want to try and help others as I have received help in the past.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: there is no "they," there is only "us." We need to be the change we want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am the program coordinator for a nonprofit social ministry organization which provides counseling and mental health services to the community and church congregations in northeast Pennsylvania.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help others.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference if we come together.

lender.name: Laila
lender.loan_because: We are thankful for the opportunities given to us and it feels good to help give similar opportunities to others.

lender.name: S. Allen
lender.loan_because: Empower others. It feels Good. We are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: Artist (painter) Designer (homes and buildings)

lender.name: Sierra Middle School
lender.loan_because: We want to change the world one family at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Middle school students

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: I want to help better the lives of those who can not make their own better on their own.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student at a Christian Brothers school in Salinas, CA

lender.name: Devon & Dawn
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to become more successful. As Muhammad Yunus, winner of the 2006 Nobel Peace Prize for his work in microfinancing, has said, credit is a basic human right.
lender.occupational_info: Devon teaches English at a university in California, USA. Dawn is a volunteer at our local elementary school and at our church.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I can see my money doing good instead of paying some high priced Charity CEO. Someone gave me a leg up and I am glad to now help someone else
lender.occupational_info: Without using cides ( pesticide, herbicides , etc) I nurture and grow food to feed our families.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I have the resources to do so. I've saved my money for a long time and I know that there are people around the world that need it more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 17 year old highschool student (Junior) and I work independently with a frined doing landscaping, mulching and gardening. I also work part time at a tennis and pool club.

lender.name: Carolyne
lender.loan_because: I like Kivas' mission and enjoy helping people meet their goals and live a better quality of life.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: It is important to me to give back some of the good I have received. May it bless another in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the financial and human resource activities of a small company. I write poetry and am working toward an M.A. in Creative Writing at night.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe helping others to provide for themselves is the most effective way to help others out of poverty. I also feel it has the largest impact on communities by developing wealth locally that will have a greater impact then just a handout to multiple persons, although that is needed at times.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to become successful by building their own business and to protect themselves and their families by providing legal plans.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: Just a little bit of help goes such a long way. It feels good to help.

lender.name: Alberto
lender.whereabouts: Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro
lender.loan_because: I'm sure it can make a diference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Ob&Gyn and I deal with many aspects of a women's life.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: As ex Peace Corps Volunteer, I know the power of small direct assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from working at a university, and have traveled by sailboat thru much of the Caribbean.

lender.name: David Stevens
lender.loan_because: One World One Dream

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: If everyone that could afford to, did the same then it would make an even bigger difference. I worked in the region of Mexico that my first loan has gone to, so I feel a conection to the place and people

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: So little combined fills an important immediate need
lender.occupational_info: Grant Writer for non-profit organizations

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a helping hand. And that despite the current poor leadership in America, the people who live here are generous and want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Architectue/ Commercial Construction

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I like helping people who are striving to improve their lives.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: LOVE IT! LOVE IT! LOVE IT!

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I want to help tiny companies grow.
lender.occupational_info: Placing advertisements on Google and other search engines to sell products.

lender.name: Diney (Hui-Ping)
lender.loan_because: it's an effective and direct way to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help people/business to save money on government taxes so they will have more money to help other people.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I can. I am by no means affluent but because of where I live in the world I have enough to share with someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I measure how different crop plants are from each other by comparing the patterns in their DNA molecules.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I Believe in Free People and Free Markets

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Social Justice and Free Enterprise? How can you beat it!
lender.occupational_info: I minister to teenagers, who my hope is to help them open their eyes to a world where the kingdom of God is present and God is moving in loving, creative ways drawing all peoples from across the globe into community and love. I currently serve as the Minister to Youth at South Main Baptist Church in Houston, Texas, which is a way better city than everyone acts ;)

lender.name: Duncan
lender.loan_because: The traditional financial system does not care.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: We are family. If one is in need, we are all in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am an organic gardener whose yard is a wildlife refuge.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help people within organizations do their work better.

lender.name: Doris
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have our own business installing x-ray equipment in hospitals. I take care of all the office duties for our business. We have been doing it since 1986.

lender.name: Catarina
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: The Fab Fob Company
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I understand the need for a little help. It's a wonderful thing to watch your business grow and be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I design and create gift wrapping products.

lender.name: Ricky
lender.loan_because: I feel that I am very fortunate in what I have obtained in life, and have witnessed severe poverty in developing countries first-hand. I feel it's important to give back to the less fortunate, and what better way to help the less fortunate help themselves over and over and over again!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a software developer for a small marketing company. I speak fluent spanish and lived in Guatemala for some time, many years ago. I enjoy helping the less fortunate here at home, as well as other countries. Some of the time I spend in Guatemala is aiding the less fortunate (as seen in my photo helping village kids get fit with new shoes)

lender.name: claire
lender.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful idea. It takes such a relatively small amount of money from us from wealthy nations to lift people out of poverty and to take control of their own lives with dignity
lender.occupational_info: paintings on ceramic and aluminium

lender.name: Dean, Betsy & Hannah
lender.loan_because: We are in gratitude for all that we have and know that by giving we receive.
lender.occupational_info: We are here to learn to love each other and our authentic selves.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I like to think of money traveling around the world to help hard-working people realize their dreams of economic independence, supporting their families, strengthening their communities, and securing a better future for their children. It makes me feel empowered to participate in the global economy this way, and it gives me hope.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Also, it helps some folks appreciate the positive contributions of gay, lesbian, bisexual, and transgendered (GLBT) people to the needs of our planet. We're all one great big family. There's a LOT to be done. Let's get to WORK !

lender.name: Bill and Heather
lender.occupational_info: Bill works to bring career-changers into K-12 classrooms in the US and Heather works on corporate strategy issues for a strategic research company.

lender.name: DudleyTania
lender.loan_because: We want to support the small business people who are willing to risk it all in an effort to better their lives and the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: We assist individuals and businesses with their investments on various exchanges (bourses), real estate and commodities.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should have an opportunity to take responsibility for their own future

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: I realize how even a small amount of support can make a huge difference in the life of another.
lender.occupational_info: After completing my MSW degree (May 2008) in the area of International Community Development I hope to work in Africa with women and young girls affected/infected by HIV/AIDS, especially as that relates to sexual and reproductive health care education.

lender.name: Kristie
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurship can play a pivotal role in fighting poverty all over the world. I believe that everyone should be given the opportunity to succeed and be self-sustainable.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an association that helps U.S. based micro-businesses, those with ten or less employees, and the self-employed startup and grow their businesses.

lender.name: Scranton School
lender.loan_because: We loan because it establishes a sense of humanity and stewardship among our students
lender.occupational_info: Scranton is a kindergarten- 8th grade school. Our KIVA donations are a project conducted by the student population and Student Council.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I want to help the hard workers who are trying to make a better living for their family.

lender.name: Wendy/bForward, Inc
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with some really good people and things in my life. I have been helped along the way. Now I feel the desire and need to "give back".
lender.occupational_info: I act as an outsourced Marketing Director for many mid - small size companies across the US.

lender.name: Nora
lender.loan_because: One can help so many with so little effort and money... very rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: We publish books, DVDs and audios of spiritual teachers...

lender.name: Miranda
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference in the life of person.
lender.occupational_info: I teach music in an independent school

lender.name: Lauren & Geoff
lender.loan_because: we want to help the kind of people that are willing to work hard to help themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Lauren works at a hotel and Geoff works as a sub-contractor helping people with home improvements.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: it makes such good sense.
lender.occupational_info: I work with libraries to insure that the resources to which they have access are easily and readily available to their patrons.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have with others.

lender.name: Kerrie
lender.loan_because: helping these small businesses grow inspires me
lender.occupational_info: I work with Google's advertising products

lender.name: Taien
lender.loan_because: doing the right thing is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I inspect the quality of meat, seafood and produce to USDA and FDA regulations.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: To help those that need an extra hand to make their economic situation a better one for them, for their family and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I look after the financial matters of an aboriginal reserve.

lender.name: Char
lender.loan_because: These funds are from the Episcopal Diocese of Spokane honoring the Millennium Development Goals for gender equality (3) and extreme poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am one of 25 people in the Diocese active in our Social Justice and Outreach Ministries Commission and lead our focused MDG effort.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: ...it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because: I wouldn't be who I am without the help of others.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because:
I know the impact starting a small business can have, not only on the owner of the new business, but their family, their employees and their community.
This is the truest purpose of money....investing in others to help them grow and enrich their lives so they can in turn help others.
lender.occupational_info: We promote home ownership. We help people learn about the process of buying and selling real estate. We then help them look for a home to buy or do the marketing necessary to help them sell their home.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I feel that the best way that people can make a difference in others lives is by giving them the opportunity to help themselves!!
lender.occupational_info: Food service

lender.name: Heidi and Evie
lender.loan_because: Having a daughter has helped me to realize how important it is to lift up women who don't have the opportunity to enjoy the same privileges that I do.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my days playing with my daughter, cooking up storms, reading and working on my art.

lender.name: Charlene
lender.loan_because: I am able to.
lender.occupational_info: I promote tourism in my small region of Canada.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: It is so gratifying to help someone that is trying to better their situation. Someone that is willing to put in the work deserves the chance to show the world what they can do. I love to help someone "rise above it", to help some one be independent, learning, growing, all that and more is super gratifying.
lender.occupational_info: I have retired from a 32 year banking career and now I make all natural organic olive oil soap from scratch and sell it. We use all natural and organic ingredients to produce our soap.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: i want people to know they are cared about

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library.

lender.name: Dominika and Family
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an equal opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Lyn
lender.loan_because: In helping others, I help myself.
lender.occupational_info: Disaster Management and Planning for: Natural Disasters, Terrorism, Pandemics, States, Cities, etc

lender.name: Kiley
lender.occupational_info: I am an immigration lawyer in Washington, D.C.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am blessed
lender.occupational_info: caring for 8 children and 1 husband, 4 dogs and 1 turtle.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part for the world by helping people to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a family doctor in a major city caring for people of all ages and their families

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: if I can share a small piece of what I have to bless someone else, then that is a blessing to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am an office assistant or office manager in a company that sells memory modules for computers.

lender.name: Dezene & Joyel
lender.occupation: Professor and teacher (and dad and mom)
lender.loan_because: "From everyone who has been given much, much will be required; and to whom they entrusted much, of him they will ask all the more." (Luke 12:48)
lender.occupational_info: We teach others about biology and English, and we raise our two wonderful sons.

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: A little can go a very long way to helping others improve their lives, realise dreams and maintain their dignity.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I'm an advocate of capitalism and free markets. These loans are a great example of how capitalism can raise people out of poverty and improve living standards across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work to keep email systems running smoothly at large companies.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I think it is important for people to be independent and be able to support themselves and their families

lender.name: Jeannie
lender.loan_because: This idea is simply brilliant, and I applaud the spirit and hard work of the entrepreneurs in this program.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunity to fulfill their dreams.

lender.name: Sarah-Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone from another country.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: MINDYTRAN
lender.loan_because: I love to see people have a better existence.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of critically ill patients

lender.name: bdb
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to help those are working to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I design things, like products and web sites.

lender.name: ANGELA
lender.loan_because: I came into the world with nothing, I shall leave with nothing, it all belongs to God........He shared.......so shall I!!!

lender.name: sunday
lender.loan_because: i will want my poutry farm to come to standard, as i still need to inprove on it
lender.occupational_info: i have been into this poutry farm for the past two year,and there is a lot of improvement to in the last few year,just that i need some loan to be able to bring it to a standard that i need by incresing the number of chuckens so as the meet the demand of the public in egg production.

lender.name: Eirik
lender.loan_because: It's a small price to pay to sleep better at night. Time to boost my karma...
lender.occupational_info: I make people pay back what they owe to the society in a way that works for everybody...

lender.name: Linn Merete
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in a meaningful way, rather than to give money to a huge, faceless organisation who spends a vast amount of money on administration.
lender.occupational_info: I teach junior high kids, full time.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people to help themselves. God bless them!
lender.occupational_info: We manufacture inflatable 'wavy men' for advertising and promotional purposes.

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupation: retired but still teach part time at community col

lender.name: Rhys
lender.occupation: Stay at Home Mum of Three
lender.loan_because: I am a mum of three beautiful healthy children who are well provided for (food, shelter, clothed, loved), and by doing this I can also help another family provide a bit more security, stability, food, and shelter for their children. I hope as small as it is that this loan can fullfill a dream and inspire another.
lender.occupational_info: Twins almost 2 years and our "surprise" baby (born 25/7/07) is extremely tiring, never-ending 24 hour job of changing nappies, bathing, feeding, breaking up fights, huge tantrums & housework but rewarded with hugs & kisses & laughter - wouldn't change a thing!

lender.name: ernest
lender.occupation: a biochemistry graduate and a graduate in computer

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: others helped me when I needed it.

lender.name: mattb
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: Because by the grace of God we can.And to keep the grace of God we should.
lender.occupational_info: A god send

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: I split my time between working at home raising our three children with my beautiful wife, Miranda, and working at a charter airline training flight attendants.

lender.name: Patricia/Bill/Grandkids
lender.loan_because: A privilege and a duty to help. I want my grandkids to know the joy of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I work part-time at home editing of academic reports and other written materials.

lender.name: Piero
lender.loan_because: I realize that some small amount of money (for me) can have a large impact somewhere else.
lender.occupational_info: I sit in an office and watch a computer all day, it's not exciting. This is one way of reaching out and connecting to other humans in the world.

lender.name: otto flux
lender.loan_because: i can, and should.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: to make our planet a little little bit better.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: a little goes a long way

lender.name: Aviv & Sharon
lender.loan_because: We want to assist others enjoy life
lender.occupational_info: We work in the software market and build our family

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I like helping others help themselves, and would be grateful if the roles were reversed.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university library. I help manage the library's online catalog and help staff with their computer problems.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: It isn't hard to find $25 to help someone create a life for themselves.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I believe in the community helping people. Our lives, although distant, are inter-related.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I'm very fortunate to be able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second Language to international students in Canada.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: of how something thats percieved as such a small amount in the US can do so much more to improve a life in another part of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a technology company that provides services to large commercial companies. I grew up on a farm so I do have a interest in the agricultural world.

lender.name: James C.
lender.loan_because: Giving is... and Feels AMAZING! ...So YOU feel Good... they feel Good ...and every day the Sun gets to shine just a little bit brighter! Aaaaah nothing like win/ win/ win/ win/ Win!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I love life and people, and i make short and long movies about them. Also when people are down i help pick them up again! ;)

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. It isn't a hand out, it is a way out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 11-13 year olds about the world.

lender.name: Maria & John
lender.loan_because: we needed loans to get on our feet, too.

lender.name: Sascha
lender.loan_because: Shopping for something really impactful, direct and lasting in lieu of simple donations to ‘mainstream’ charities, I found KIVA, a clever fusion of microfunding and good people using advanced IT. With consistently good feedback from all stakeholders, I trust these guys and keep on lending regularly since Oct 2007.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the European Union, helping that people fly safely.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to speak English.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need help.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it's a way to impact the world at the grassroots level. People need hope, and financial support is one way to cultivate hope.

lender.name: Mark Whittington
lender.loan_because: I just saw the paradigm shift, and realized it's potential...I mean, look what the profit motive has gotten us.
lender.occupational_info: i have just begun buying in the Middle East, to sell in the U.S.- and researching what to bring back from there to sell here.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I help people find things.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been in need before, and people who are able to help are a godsend.
lender.occupational_info: I am in Marketing and Sales, and own my own business. This is an amazing gift to business owners across the globe, and I look forward to continuing to

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are less fortunate than me.

lender.name: Janet & Albert
lender.loan_because: I believe education will be the key to a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a regional accountant for a public corporation

lender.name: Nate & Tracie
lender.loan_because: We can impact the world in a positive way by helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Owners of a personal training studio.

lender.name: Howard
lender.occupational_info: I am a civil engineer. I have worked on port and harbour projects in many parts of the world including Central and South America, North Africa and Indonesia. I now look after the buildings that house the lifeboats around the coasts of the UK and Ireland.

lender.name: Basil
lender.loan_because: I need to set up a stationery bookshop and a photocopying machine to help community schools and institutions around.
lender.occupational_info: I am a tutor or a teacher trainer

lender.name: Spencer Paul
lender.occupational_info: Student at Brigham Young University.

lender.name: Mike Tracey Nathan & Tim
lender.loan_because: Microcredit can change lives! What a privilege to be able to assist people in a way that preserves their dignity.
lender.occupational_info: Mike helps ensure that aircraft purchased by the Australian military are safe and can do the job. Tracey buys and manages real estate, and takes primary responsibility for home duties and child rearing.

lender.name: Andy (& Macha)
lender.loan_because: I come from a poor family and I know what is the value of the money when you need it. Vengo de una familia pobre, y se cual es el valor del dinero cuando lo necesita.

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: I want to help motivated entrepreneurs succeed
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that answers complex strategic and operational questions for large corporations

lender.name: Tawny
lender.occupational_info: A couple friends and I make glass jewelry - we focus sunlight using a large magnifying lens to melt the glass.

lender.name: Tom & Michelle
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can, and because we can, we believe we should.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students reading and writing and Michelle works helping adults who are handicapped.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to Kazakhstan and seen the potential of the people there. The economic situation in the rest of Central Asia is not as optimistic as in Kazakhstan but the desires of the people are great.
lender.occupational_info: I am a preschool teacher, wife, and most importantly mother. In my "previous life" I was a nurse in pediatrics and nursery/NICU.

lender.name: The Rowleys
lender.occupation: Gas Utility Tech, Computer tech, 2 students.
lender.loan_because: We think that anyone willing to work hard deserves the chance to improve their and their family's life. We have so much that is good and think that this is a good way to share effectively. This is how the children have agreed to spend their Christmas money this year.
lender.occupational_info: I am a natural gas service tech.(provincial gas utility) and my wife Lynette is an information tech. (computers) with the district health region. Spencer is in grade 3. Grady is in grade 7.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I sell home security systems to home owners to keep their home and family safe.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for I want to share my good fortune with other women. As a single woman raising 2 children I know times can get hard.My hpoe is to help others to be successful and give them encouragement.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because:
I believe in microcredit and microenterprise development.
I am also a Return Peace Corps Volunteer (Burkina Faso 1984-1986) and saw first hand how strong and capable African women are.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: it's good to spread the wealth

lender.name: Alisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help people fund their entrepreneurial dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I run a trivia business in pubs.

lender.name: Xan
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic opportunity to reach out and help those who are working hard to improve their lives. I'm so grateful for all that my family has and this is such a simple way to share.
lender.occupational_info: I support the sales and marketing departments computer systems.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I've built my own business and I know it takes money to make money. This is a perfect way to help other hard-working folks to be sucessful.
lender.occupational_info: I own a company that manufactures and sell a stall treat for horses

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: As a teacher, I help young men & women understand the wonders of biology. As a woodworker, I create art from wood.

lender.name: C & M
lender.loan_because: Microfinance makes a lot of sense.
lender.occupational_info: We work with computer systems in various ways.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I think this is such an awesome and practical idea! Many hands make light work. Kudos to the founders!
lender.occupational_info: Insurance

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I live in such luxury because I was born in a rich country, no other reason. The rest of the world deserves a taste of a better life, especially if all they need is simply working capital to obtain their goals

lender.name: Leanne, Taz and Dex
lender.loan_because: we all seek comfort, prosperity and security.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: Our late son Greg was aciively trying to aid those in developing countries.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it so easy for us to do this together.
lender.occupational_info: washing dishes

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: I want to demonstrate to my grandchildren that each of us can make a difference - that we're all connected.
lender.occupational_info: A mother of four and grandmother of three, I write articles about health and women's issues for magazines and newspapers.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Pay back for comfortable life. Help people in need.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I understand what it is like to have a great idea or product and no money to support that idea.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have a severe and persistent mental illness. I help them learn coping strategies to increase their knowledge and strength in themselves.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I want to help others that aren't as fortunate as we are here in the U.S.

lender.name: Kylie & Toby
lender.loan_because: Everyone in this world has a right to have everything they want and need, to be happy and healthy not just the rich
lender.occupational_info: I'm a stay at home mum of 3 young boys, my husband works as GMH a car manufacturing plant as a store man and fork truck driver. We make an average earnings but I wish I had more money so I could help other people. THE WORLD IS NOTHING WITHOUT THE PEOPLE IN IT, AND WITHOUT THEM THERE IS NO POINT TO HAVING A WORLD

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I hope it can bring "happiness" to someones life... if the world can come together to "give more" then we all would be in a happier place.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: It is less than I spend on a nice dinnner. Think about that. The needs of people around the world are less than a minor night out for me. Are things askew, or what.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Encouraging self-sustainability and economic independence is an important part of my Left-Libertarian activism. For more about Left-Libertarianism see: http://mutualist.blogspot.com/ , http://www.bradspangler.com/blog/ , and http://groups.yahoo.com/group/LeftLibertarian2/

lender.name: West
lender.loan_because: I love to help
lender.occupational_info: Actor

lender.name: kisty
lender.loan_because: My life has been blessed so I'm simply paying it forward!

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: It's nice to know that a small loan can make such a big difference
lender.occupational_info: I talk to the press about a large software company

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for all life has given me and hope to help enrich the lives of others.

lender.name: Cat
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the computing envorinment for a technical and scientific community of users.

lender.name: DennisKeller
lender.loan_because: It's important.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: In the end what matters most is not what we have, but rather what we have shared.

lender.name: Lonna
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to be able to give an amount I can afford that can make such a significant difference in someone else's life, and to be a part of such a huge, wonderful, worldwide community.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the business side of a computer repair company, which includes everything but the actual repair/technical side.

lender.name: Roweth Family
lender.loan_because: Love the way that this is a hand up and not a hand out and we can keep on helping family after family and in doing so help a whole community.

lender.name: maddie & sophie
lender.loan_because: Our family believe this is a wonderful project and we are so lucky that we felt we needed to share some of our good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: This is a gift from us to you. Reap the benefits.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I like the stories and admire people that are trying to make a better life for themselves. Its a great feeling to be able to help in some way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a child care assistant and carer of my adult brother. I have 4 children. Recently completed child care certificate. Also studying property investment so I can make a better life for my family and help others.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I believe in providing opportunity to others who are willing to work hard to achieve an improved life for themselves and their families. I especially believe in the goals of micro finance providing to those in underdeveloped countries with an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am an executive for a company that makes video projectors and flat screen televisions.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I am a fortunate one.
lender.occupational_info: I write fiction under the name Kundan Ewan.

lender.name: Spoon with Fork
lender.loan_because: In the business of helping people

lender.name: VIPDIP
lender.loan_because: We think that people know how to best help themselves, just give them the chance.
lender.occupational_info: We are an organisation that support youths with chronic illness (mostly diabetes) to carry out their own projects. We also support education of for example diabetes dogs.

lender.name: Terry
lender.occupational_info: I make teeth......

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: I think it is the best way to help others- to help themselves.

lender.name: Kristoffer
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a brilliant idea! Instead of having money, doing not much good, at the bank I can help people make a living. Fantastic!

lender.name: jenny
lender.loan_because: what good is wealth is you don't share it with those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: i make alcoholic beverages for people who seek to drown their troubles in intoxication. i feed and condone a vice, therefore, the need to give is inane.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I want to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I run projects involved in information technology for a shipping company.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It is a gift to be able to assist others to independence!
lender.occupational_info: Nursing is about caring for others and teaching is about assisting others to learn new and interesting things.

lender.name: Juliana
lender.loan_because: KIVA is on the rights path to solving world poverty at a grass roots level. Instead of giving money to corrupt governments who dont pass it onto their people, this gives the money directly to the people who can then create a business to sustain their families and hopefully achieve a better life.
lender.occupational_info: As a self employed Bookkeeper, I run my own business and help other people by taking care of their accounts/ finances in preparation for the accountant.

lender.name: Bev
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by what Kiva is achieving after hearing about it on the Oprah Show. I hope to give more and tell my family and friends about it so they can give as well.

lender.name: eLiz
lender.loan_because: I have visited several countries in the developing world and have seen how hard people work to support their families. This is such a simple and fun way to help.
lender.occupational_info: Because I am retired, I have time to take care of my grandchildren, visit friends, travel, read and do all the little jobs that are needed around the house.

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: I have $1 to give.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a library. I help patrons, and keep the library clean and tidy. I help patrons find books that they may be interested in reading.

lender.name: Linda and Ehren Ramos
lender.loan_because: I sometimes need a loan myself, and I always have someone to ask. It makes me feel good to lend a helping hand to people who don't have anywhere else to turn. I can't offer much, but every little bit helps, right?
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my two beautiful kids, Wyatt and Helena. My mom recently had a stroke and lives with us, too. Ehren is a carpenter and a wonderful father!

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concept of helping others to help themselves. I cannot sit back and not participate when we in the developed world waste so much while so many in the developing world seek so little for their basic necessities.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I started my own business 35 years ago with $600 in start up capital and now have 25 employees and am the largest florist in our area.
lender.occupational_info: We sell fresh flowers, plants, gifts and balloons to the public and business customers. We send flowers anywhere in the US and around the world.

lender.name: Melissa & Dave
lender.loan_because: though I do not have a lot of money, i know how much just a hand up can give someone.
lender.occupational_info: She is a military veteran...She wrote stories for the military newspaper and made a nightly tv news program for the other troops. He is a motorcycle (Harley Davidson) Mechanic.

lender.name: Jeremy and Heather
lender.loan_because: It is a great idea and it helps make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: A guy who fixes computers and a nurse that takes care of babies.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I can, it feels good to be able to help and see the progress.
lender.occupational_info: Studying at School of Business, Economics and Law i Gothenburg, Sweden.

lender.name: Ernie
lender.loan_because: At times in my life when I really needed help, sometimes it came from people that hardly knew me.
lender.occupational_info: I repair scooters and mopeds.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: loans have helped me! It's my pleasure to share what I have.
lender.occupational_info: *I re-gift useful information as humor.* In my latest book, I teach women how to read a man by his shoes. It's titled: Never Trust a Man in Alligator Loafers.

lender.name: Lila
lender.loan_because: I believe credit is a fundamental human right and Kiva is an efficient way for my money to directly benefit someone truly in need.

lender.name: Mary Lynn
lender.loan_because: I believe the small investments we make in the livelihoods of others will make huge improvements in the lives of many.
lender.occupational_info: As a nurse in the post-anesthesia area of a surgical unit, I assist patients as they recover from the effects of anesthesia, help manage any symptoms they may have such as pain or nausea, and prepare them to manage their activities at home following their surgical procedure. I am committed to caring and advocating for my patients.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: If I can help loved ones or friends, knowing part-none will be repaid why wouldn’t I help someone who’s more willing to help themselves and has a solid work ethic???
lender.occupational_info: Administration Assistants in my area are not paid well. Per the cost of living I am still "low income" for my area. I know how it is to fight to make enough to eat and care for myself, my home and animals. I choose to live in the country so my home is quiet and peaceful and I am able to rent land. If I was to live in the city I could make much better money doing the same thing. To me, making more money is not worth sacrificing a relaxing home, even if it means almost twice the work to do all on my own!!!

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I love this concept! It stimulates the economy at a grassroots level. If this takes-off it will truly solve many problems. You will notice that most of the businesses are agriculture. That is telling.
lender.occupational_info: Jiibe.com is my company. We help people make better decisions for a happier life.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: nothing feels better than being able to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help train and develop new customer service reps to be successful employees.

lender.name: Penny & Pixie
lender.loan_because: We are two sisters running a small family business out of our homes and we wanted to help another woman running her own business.
lender.occupational_info: We have a product line made from recycled sails - we love that our products are eco-friendly.

lender.name: william
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: academic

lender.name: Bengt in Sweden
lender.loan_because: It seems like the natural thing to do!

lender.name: Ramona
lender.loan_because: I have received a Kiva gift certificate on my birthday from some very dear friends of mine. I do think we can help others; it makes such a big difference to their lives!

lender.name: Ahulani
lender.loan_because: I have such abundance in my life and I have been helped by so many people. I also receive great pleasure in supporting women to be independent and to thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories about my childhood and about the nature around me, the people I meet and the things I have learned along the way. I assist people in gaining a new perspective on what is troubling them and regaining their health.

lender.name: Mariam
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those that want to help themselves.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.occupation: Therapist in the Child Welfare Field
lender.loan_because: I believe in global giving.
lender.occupational_info: I assist families in crisis and help them find ways to stay together and take care of one another.

lender.name: Guy
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I do 'something with computers' and am passionate about the power of formal project managment in delivering change.

lender.name: Sharath
lender.loan_because:
- Not at all of are credit-worthy to start with and thus benefit from lending instruments offered by for-profit institutions.
- Kiva's logistics and administrative resources together with the financial support of volunteer lenders can go some distance in compensating for the lottery of birth.
- Finally, while I would donate and support grants for children, I am more likely to loan to able adults - they make development sustainable at a macro-level and at a microlevel, enable individuals become and remain responsible.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the intersection of statistics, advertising, user-experience and language.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I can. I should. I must. It sounds cliche, but we ARE the world. Let's all make it a little better place to be.

lender.name: james
lender.loan_because: it's a simple and effective way to improve our world by investing in people. as an american, i am blessed with numerous opportunities for success, and i want to create those opportunities for others around the world who are every bit as deserving. this is one way i feel called to "love my neighbor as myself".
lender.occupational_info: i'm a geek.

lender.name: Giuseppe
lender.loan_because: we westerners must help people living in poorer areas
lender.occupational_info: researcher in materials science (energy field); experimental poet / playwright.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I want to help everyone's business dreams come true...everyone deserves a chance!
lender.occupational_info: I am a buyer/merchandiser of clothes for a large retailer in the United States.

lender.name: Tolga
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Managing projects that provide telecommunications infrastructure in developing countries

lender.name: Megan & Jack
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give - Winston Churchill

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I'm so thankful for the opportunites that continue to come my way. I want to do my part to create opportunities for others...

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I love to offer a chance for someone to build a business and succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of small children

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: it's a small way to contribute to the cause of economic justice in our world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a vision insurance company. I sit in a cubicle all day, working at a computer, processing receipts people send in to get money back when they have paid for an eye exam and new glasses. I don't make a huge amount of money doing this, but the company I work for pays for my healthcare, and I can pay my rent, have a good car, and always have plenty to eat. And, I have enough money to be able to give a little to those who don't have a lot.

lender.name: Henderson Family
lender.loan_because: I want to help hardworking people succeed and raise their standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: I help young men who lack direction in life to become successful.

lender.name: TOMMIE
lender.loan_because: jesus says ,you do it for the least of these, you do it for me . i want to always do my part to uplift someone in need

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: hard working and honest micro business owners deserve the opportunity to grow their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sculptor and have run my own business since 1992.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of people to raise themselves up understanding that sometimes people need a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in rural places support and invest in their own communities.

lender.name: james
lender.loan_because: This seems like a concept that really works!-- and that's a big deal in this world. Also, to honor my parents who made giving a way of life.....

lender.name: Nico
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.occupational_info: Just a regular college student. :)
